The decision to host the European Games was a manifestation of justice for European sport. The homeland of the Olympic movement, olympic is in Europe.
Azerbaijan held games in the memory of all Europe.
European Games are a friendly event. For Azerbaijan, this is an opportunity for Europeans to demonstrate their history, traditions and music.
The new Structural Reform Support Service will start its work on 1 July. #TeamJunckerEU #EuropeanSemester
Azerbaijan has always been a place of interethnic harmony, multiculturalism, ethnic and religious diversity.
Azerbaijan is not only geographical but also cultural, economic and political bridge between Europe and Asia.
The Azerbaijani economy is stable, stable and developing.
Over the past 10 years, the economy of Azerbaijan has increased 3 times, poverty has dropped from 49% to 5%, and the unemployment rate is below 5%.
Azerbaijan's external debt is less than 10 percent of gross domestic product.
Today, Baku is one of the most developed cities in the region and possibly the world's most advanced sports infrastructure.
The future goal is to turn Azerbaijan into an advanced country of the world and bring its criteria to the highest international standards.

There are 5 million strugglers who have left behind the fear of oversight, because their business is formalized. # 5 million MEI
Five million entrepreneurs whose potential market has become much larger, because they can issue invoices. # 5 million MEI
5 million workers with right to maternity, sickness and retirement benefits, because they contribute to Welfare. # 5 million MEI
These 5 million people already existed and worked with courage and vigor to keep their little ones. before the creation of the MEI. # 5 million MEI
The novelty was to legalize and reduce taxation to make them appropriate to the reality of these enterprises. # 5 million MEI
With the MEI, the Brazilian State finally acted to guarantee citizenship to individual microentrepreneurs. # 5 million MEI
The story of Delci Lutz is a good example. # 5 million MEI http://t.co/VLa6LWy5ID
If the # FamilyFellowship was important to supplement the family's income, and #Pronatec was able to qualify, it was MEI that formalized their business.
In times of debate about our youth, nothing better than creating new opportunities for our young people. # 5 million MEI
Instead of deepening exclusion with ineffective actions, such as reducing the age of criminality (...)
(...) we prefer to work to offer millions of young people a passport to the world of education and work. # 5 million MEI
We managed to leave behind the time when people of talent, courage and daring were at the mercy of their fate (...)
(...) without any kind of support from the government, with duties equal to those of large companies. # 5 million MEI
We have promoted a silent but decisive revolution in favor of the struggling entrepreneurs of Brazil. # 5 million MEI http://t.co/pRUWXNXjHm
Today we look at the trajectory of simplification and reduction of taxes with the certainty that came to stay. # 5 million MEI
